alert.note: Alert for Wallace (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 3:28PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Wallace County through 245 PM MDT... At 227 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Wallace, or 13 miles northeast of Sharon Springs. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. The strong winds may be localized within the storm. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Wallace County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Goodland.
